package.name: CallFavorites3dTouch快速拨打电话-Rootless
package.shortDescription: Favorites in the 3D Touch menu for the Phone app

descriptionlist.description: Favorites in the 3D Touch menu for the Phone app iOS 14 completely removed the Phone widget, making it harder to access your favorite contacts. This tweak brings your favorite contacts back to the 3D touch menu. . Requires iOS 14.0 or later. This feature is built into older versions of iOS. 3Dtouch快速拨打电话
